Title: Microsoft Viva: External benchmarks in Advanced Insights
Description:
External benchmarks provide Insights analysts with helpful reference points to illustrate what "normal" looks like across other companies with similar size or industry profiles, to help users interpret their company's own Insights results. External benchmarks will be available to analyst users in Advanced Insights as a new page in the Copilot Headlines Power BI report.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025
